price: Na anka yεkͻtena (ͻsoro) tenabea no mu baabi sεdeε yεbεtie (ͻsoro asafo no adwen a, wͻrefa). Na seesei deε obi a (ͻbεkͻ hͻ) akotie no, ͻbεkͻ akͻto ogya tanaa a εretwεn no.
arabic: وَأَنَّا كُنَّا نَقۡعُدُ مِنۡهَا مَقَٰعِدَ لِلسَّمۡعِۖ فَمَن يَسۡتَمِعِ ٱلۡأٓنَ يَجِدۡ لَهُۥ شِهَابٗا رَّصَدٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-annā kunnā naqʿudu min'hā maqāʿida lilssamʿi faman yastamiʿi al-āna yajid lahu shihāban raṣadan
